mapper.select:
select
FROM t_product_type a,t_material_type b WHERE a.material_type_id = b.material_type_id and a.del_flag=0 AND product_type_id =#{natrualkey} limit 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_product_type where del_flag=0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_product_type a,t_material_type b WHERE a.material_type_id = b.material_type_id and a.del_flag=0
and ( a.product_type_name like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') or b.material_type_name like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') or a.remark like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
select case when max(product_type_id) is NULL then 0 else max(product_type_id) end from t_product_type

select product_type_id AS natrualkey, product_type_name AS name from t_product_type where del_flag=0
and upper(product_type_name) like concat('%',#{name},'%')
